text:
别说这些大学本科妈妈了，就是孙燕姿，前几天生日她录了一个视频解释为什么 2025 才开演唱会。说是因为她家小朋友要小升初了。据说新加坡小升初重要性不亚于国内高考 （？）

https://telegra.ph/什么是造成新加坡低生育率的主要因素-07-25-2

感觉真的已经是我能力范围内的 “枝枝说到叶叶上” （家乡一俚语，表示不能再具体了），虽然一股 ChatGPT 味。好吧。

quoted_message.text: 啊啊啊啊好烦啊（破口大骂），到底怎么样才能有 changed files 再 commit ，已经改了好多遍还是不行。

text:
Late at night, I unexpectedly started video chatting with my ex-bf. I realized that after breaking up, I no longer have emotional demands on him, and the state between us has become more relaxed. In the past, I used to spend a lot of time thinking about my relationship with another person, wondering why he said certain things, why he didn't consider me, why he didn't do things the way I wanted. 

I spent a great deal of time questioning and doubting others' love for me. But most men probably aren't naturally educated to be like this; they don't have attachment anxiety or survival anxiety. After the breakup, I found that I've become more independent and autonomous. I no longer timidly try to falsify or verify things. Perhaps this is the most precious thing I've learned from this relationship.
